dlentry.dt: Need to verify an existing LIC file.

ol.li:
Enter the following command: /usr/sbin/euca-describe-properties | grep ldap
The output from the example above shows the name of the LIC file and status of the synchronization (set to false). PROPERTY authentication.ldap_integration_configuration { 'sync': { 'enable':'false' } }
